post.description: Log in an existing user using email and password

get.description: Get the information of the currently logged-in user based on the JWT token

token.description: JWT token for the authenticated user

get.summary: Get full details of a user
get.description:
Retrieve detailed information about a user. 
- If the logged-in user requests their own details, the following data will be returned:
  - `id`
  - `name`
  - `email`
  - `avatarURL`
  - `totalRecipes`
  - `totalFollowers`
  - `totalFollowing`
  - `totalFavoriteRecipes`

- If the logged-in user requests details of another user, the following data will be returned:
  - `id`
  - `name`
  - `email`
  - `avatarURL`
  - `totalRecipes`
  - `totalFollowers`
  - `isFollowing`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID to retrieve full details

totalRecipes.description: Total number of recipes created by the user

totalFollowers.description: Total number of followers of the user

totalFollowing.description: Total number of users the user is following

totalFavoriteRecipes.description: Total number of favorite recipes of the user

isFollowing.description: Indicates whether the current user follows this user

400.description: Bad request: Missing user ID parameter

patch.description: Update the avatar image of the currently authenticated user

avatar.description: User avatar image file to upload

400.description: Bad request: Invalid file type or no file attached

post.description:
Allows the logged-in user to follow another user. 
- If the logged-in user tries to follow themselves, the request will fail with a `400` status code.
- If the logged-in user is already following the target user, the request will fail with a `409` status code.
- The user to be followed must exist, otherwise a `404` status code will be returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID of the target user to be followed

userId.description: The ID of the user being followed

followerId.description: The ID of the user who is following

400.description: Bad request: You cannot follow yourself

404.description: User not found: The target user to be followed does not exist

409.description: Conflict: You are already following this user

delete.description:
Allows the logged-in user to unfollow another user. 
- If the logged-in user tries to unfollow themselves, the request will fail with a `400` status code.
- If the logged-in user is not following the target user, the request will fail with a `409` status code.
- The user to be unfollowed must exist, otherwise a `404` status code will be returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID of the target user to be unfollowed

userId.description: The ID of the user being unfollowed

400.description: Bad request: You cannot unfollow yourself

404.description: User not found: The target user to be unfollowed does not exist

409.description: Conflict: You are not following this user

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves the followers of a specific user.
- Each follower contains basic information and a list of their owned recipes (if available).
- The response includes pagination details for both followers and their recipes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID to get followers for

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for followers pagination (defaults to 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of followers to return per page (defaults to 5)

parameters.name: recipeLimit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to return per follower (defaults to 4)

message.example: Followers list of users found successfully

totalRecipes.description: Total number of recipes owned by the follower

following.description: Indicates if the user is following the given follower

ownedRecipes.description: Preview of recipes owned by the follower

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there is a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there is a next page

400.description: Bad request: Invalid or missing query parameters

get.summary: Get list of users the current user is following
get.description: Retrieve a list of users that the authenticated user is following along with their recipes

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination of followed users

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of followed users to return per page

parameters.name: recipeLimit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to return per page for each followed user

200.description: Successfully retrieved followed users with their recipes

message.example: Following list of users found successfully

totalRecipes.description: Total number of recipes for this followed user

page.description: Current page number for followed users

limit.description: Number of followed users per page

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there is a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there is a next page

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all available areas. The response will return the areas with their details.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the area was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the area was last updated

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all available categories. The response will return the categories with their details.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the category was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the category was last updated

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all available ingredients. The response will return the ingredients with their details.

desc.description: A detailed description of the ingredient
desc.example: A type of cephalopod with a soft, cylindrical body and long tentacles, often used in seafood dishes such as calamari or grilled squid.

img.description: URL to the image of the ingredient

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the ingredient was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the ingredient was last updated

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all available testimonials.

userId.description: ID of the user who gave the testimonial

testimonial.description: Content of the testimonial provided by the user
testimonial.example: Foodies has transformed my cooking experience! With its diverse recipe collection and user-friendly interface, I can easily find, save, and cook delicious meals for any occasion. From quick dinners to elaborate feasts, this app has become my go-to kitchen companion. Highly recommended!

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the testimonial was created

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of all recipes based on the provided filters such as owner, category, area, ingredient, and favorite.
The response will return a paginated list of recipes along with their details including the owner name and avatar.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to fetch (pagination)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: favorite
parameters.description: The user ID to filter recipes that are marked as favorites by the user

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category ID to filter recipes

parameters.name: ingredient
parameters.description: The ingredient ID to filter recipes that contain a specific ingredient

parameters.name: area
parameters.description: The area ID to filter recipes by area

categoryId.description: Category ID the recipe belongs to

ownerId.description: ID of the user who owns the recipe

areaId.description: Area ID the recipe belongs to

description.example: A classic British cake made with almond sponge cake and covered with marzipan.

time.description: Time (in minutes) required to prepare the recipe

thumb.description: Thumbnail image URL for the recipe

isFavorite.description: Indicates if the recipe is marked as favorite by the user

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there is a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there is a next page

post.summary: Create a new recipe with thumbnail
post.description:
This endpoint allows authenticated users to create new recipes.
Ingredients should be sent as a JSON string in the 'ingredients' field.

ingredients.description:
JSON array of ingredients as string.
Example: [{"ingredientId":"640c2dd963a319ea671e3664","measure":"100 g"}]

400.description:
Bad request. Possible reasons:
- Invalid input data
- Missing required fields
- Invalid ingredients format

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of the most popular recipes based on the number of times they have been favorited by users.
The response includes recipe details, owner information, and whether the recipe is favorited by the active user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of recipes to fetch (default is 10)

recipeDescription.example: A delicious grilled squid recipe for seafood lovers.

recipeUserName.description: Name of the user who owns the recipe

recipeUserAvatar.description: Avatar URL of the user who owns the recipe

recipeLikeStatus.description: Indicates whether the recipe is favorited by the active user

get.summary: Get a single recipe by ID
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves detailed information about a specific recipe by its ID.
The response includes the recipe's title, description, instructions, ingredients, owner details, and associated category and area.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the recipe to retrieve

description.example: A delicious grilled squid recipe for seafood lovers.

time.description: Time (in minutes) required to prepare the recipe

thumb.description: Thumbnail image URL for the recipe

measure.description: Measurement for the ingredient in this recipe

area.description: Name of the area associated with the recipe

category.description: Name of the category associated with the recipe

ownerName.description: Name of the user who owns the recipe

ownerAvatar.description: Avatar URL of the user who owns the recipe

delete.description:
This endpoint allows an authenticated user to delete a recipe by its ID.
The user must be the owner of the recipe to perform this action.
If the recipe is successfully deleted, the response will have a 204 status code with no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the recipe to delete

403.description: Forbidden (user is not the owner of the recipe)

get.summary: Get user's own recipes with pagination
get.description:
Returns a paginated list of recipes created by the specified user.
Includes ingredients list and favorite status for authenticated users.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose recipes to retrieve

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page

400.description:
Bad Request. Possible reasons:
- Invalid user ID format
- Page number out of range

get.description:
Returns paginated list of user's favorite recipes.
Can get favorites for any user by ID (if authorized as admin)
or only own favorites when using own ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
ID of the user whose favorites to retrieve.
For regular users - must be their own ID.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page

400.description:
Bad Request. Possible reasons:
- Invalid user ID format
- Page number out of range

403.description: Forbidden (trying to access other user's favorites without permission)

post.description:
Adds a specific recipe to the authenticated user's favorites list.
Returns error if recipe is already in favorites.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the recipe to add to favorites

400.description:
Bad Request. Possible reasons:
- Recipe is already in favorites
- Invalid recipe ID format

delete.description:
Removes a specific recipe from the authenticated user's favorites list.
Returns error if recipe was not in favorites.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the recipe to remove from favorites

400.description:
Bad Request. Possible reasons:
- Recipe was not in favorites
- Invalid recipe ID format
